Name: assign_team_to_project
Description: Binary variable: 1 if Team t is assigned to Project p, 0 otherwise.

Name: assign_worker_to_team
Description: Binary variable: 1 if Worker w is assigned to Team t, 0 otherwise.

Name: select_feature_for_release
Description: Binary variable: 1 if Feature f is included in a specific Release Plan, 0 otherwise.

Name: select_user_story_for_sprint
Description: Binary variable: 1 if User Story us is selected for Sprint sp, 0 otherwise.

Name: assign_task_to_worker
Description: Binary variable: 1 if Task tsk is assigned to Worker w, 0 otherwise.

Name: start_project
Description: Binary variable: 1 if Project p is greenlit and started, 0 otherwise.

Name: number_of_workers_in_team
Description: Integer variable representing the number of workers to assign to Team t.

Name: allocate_worker_capacity_to_project
Description: Float variable representing the percentage of a worker's time allocated to a project.

Name: set_sprint_start_date
Description: Date variable determining the start date for a given sprint.

Name: set_feature_priority
Description: Integer variable to set or adjust the priority of a feature in the backlog.

Name: choose_scrum_master_for_team
Description: Categorical variable to assign a specific Scrum Master sm to a Team t.

Name: determine_sprint_count_for_release
Description: Integer variable for the number of sprints planned for a release.
